name: Quick 25 Doors - a fun games
description:
Welcome to Quick 25 Doors - a cool escape game!

Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles, match objects and get passwords and other things to unlock all 25 doors.Lets see how smart and talented you are to get through these 25 doors and finish the game. Are you ready for the challenge? Then go ahead take up the game and play.


Do you think you have the skills with Quick 25 Doors - a cool escape game?

Quick 25 Doors Escape is another point and click room escape game developed by Bamvd. Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles, match objects and get passwords and other things to unlock all 25 doors. Good luck and have fun!
